title: Disciple
fluff: Drows are talented fighters and gain powerful magic through the worship of their strange chaotic deities.
weapons: Club, crossbow, dagger, mace, longbow, longsword, shortbow, shortsword

specialTalents.name: Languages.
specialTalents.description: You know either Diabolic or Primordial.

specialTalents.name: Spider Affinity.
specialTalents.description: Drow live alongside many different species of spiders, including giant ones. They can speak the secret language of spiders and gain a +1 bonus to reaction rolls when encountering spiders.

specialTalents.name: Deity.
specialTalents.description: Choose a chaotic god to serve (see Deities). You have a holy symbol for your god (it takes up no gear slots).

talents.talent: Gain advantage on casting one spell you know
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores

reward.name: Fane.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of Patriarch/Matriarch a drow may establish or build a Fane. When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.
